encyclopedia.content: 中文拼写： 华莱士 名字含义： 威尔士人 名字来源： 法语 1.Alfred Wallace 艾尔弗雷德·华莱士： （1823～1913)，英格兰博物学家，其物种起源学说与达尔文的相似。 2.Lewis Wallace 刘易斯·华莱士： (1827～1905), 美国将军、外交家、作家。 3.George Corley Wallace 乔治·科雷·华莱士： (1919～), 美国政治家， 连续三次任阿拉巴马州长。

means.word_mean: 1. Scottish insurgent who led the resistance to Edward I; in 1297 he gained control of Scotland briefly until Edward invaded Scotland again and defeated Wallace and subsequently executed him (1270-1305)
2. English writer noted for his crime novels (1875-1932)
3. English naturalist who formulated a concept of evolution that resembled Charles Darwin's (1823-1913)
